text: Dream () is a 1941 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Romm.Путь Ильича: как снимать фильмы о вождях и остаться человекомМечта (1941) It stars Yelena Kuzmina, Vladimir Solovyov, and Vladimir Shcheglov. == Actors == * Yelena Kuzmina - Anna * Vladimir Solovyov - Vasil, Anna's brother * Vladimir Shcheglov - Tomash, worker * Faina Ranevskaya - Madame Rosa Skorokhodova * Arkadi Kislyakov - Lazar Skorokhod * Ada Vojtsik - Vanda == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1941 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Romm
title: Dream (1941 movie)
